explanation: [0-0] A red and black toy gun is on a brown hardwood floor, with a transparent plastic attachment on top. Someone off-screen places a cardboard box above it, containing yellow and orange balls.

[0-6] A pair of hands pour the yellow and orange balls into the transparent plastic attachment, with many balls spilling onto the floor. The camera zooms in as the transparent plastic attachment fills up.
